  fvres(cv(hs0), cxp(universe, universe), c1st)

blocks.name: tpr2rico
blocks.content: For any point of an open set of the usual topology on ` ( RR X. RR ) ` there is an open square which contains that point and is entirely in the open set. This is square is actually a ball by the ` ( l ^ +oo ) ` norm ` X ` . (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 21-Sep-2017.)
blocks.origin:
